Aktivität Polymer Tribology Fundamentals (Friction & Wear) auswählen

Polymer tribology deals with mechanisms and regularities of friction and wear of polymers and polymer-based composites. It studies a variety of processes running in the contact at friction of such materials.
Aktivität Dynamisch-mechanische (thermische) Analyse - DMA / DMTA auswählen
